overview:
Mario Esquer is an entrepreneur and founder of Avadium Design and Esquer Industries. He is also the co-chair for the Industrial Designers Society of America for Arizona.

Mario grew up in Scottsdale, Arizona. He has always been a visionary and leader. He was inspired at a young age with technology and design. He later attend Arizona State University where he graduated with honors in Industrial Design.

During college, Mario Esquer co-founded Distoric Design Group with Derek Underhill. This was Mario’s first experience as a consultant in the design industry. He later left Distoric Design Group in 2009 to start Avadium.

Avadium Design was created to be a leader in product design and development. Mario quickly had Avadium branch out into packaging and marketing to support its core design.
